data_table.description: Inflammation Form, INF, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: INFA1A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have hepatitis or jaundice? Q1A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA1B
variable.description: Have you had more than one episode of this in the past 10 years? Q1B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA1C
variable.description: Have you had at least one episode during the last 12 months? Q1C [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA2A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have tuberculosis or TB? Q2A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA2B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have tuberculosis or TB? Was it diagnosed in the past 10 years? Q2B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA2C
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have tuberculosis or TB? In the last 12 months? Q2C [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA3A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have arthritis? Q3A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA3B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have arthritis? Have you had more than one episode or flare-up in the past 10 years? Q3B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA3C
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have arthritis? Have you had at least one episode in the last 12 months? Q3C [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA4A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have a urinary tract or kidney infection? Q4A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA4B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have a urinary tract or kidney infection? Have you had more than one episode of this in the past 10 years? Q4B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA4C
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have a urinary tract or kidney infection? Have you had at least one episode in the last 12 months? Q4C [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA5A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have pneumonia? Q5A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA5B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have pneumonia? Have you had more than one episode of this in the past 10 years? Q5B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA5C
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have pneumonia? Have you had at least one episode in the last 12 months? Q5C [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA6A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had bronchitis? Q6A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA6B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had bronchitis? Have you had more than one episode of this in the past 10 years? Q6B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA6C
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had bronchitis? Have you had at least one episode in the last 12 months? Q6C [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA7A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had sinusitis or a sinus infection? Q7A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA7B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had sinusitis or a sinus infection? Have you had more than one episode of this in the past 10 years? Q7B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA7C
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had sinusitis or a sinus infection? Have you had at least one episode in the last 12 months? Q7C [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA9
variable.description: Have you ever had a fever blister or cold sore on your lips? Q9 [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA9B
variable.description: Have you ever had a fever blister or cold sore on your lips? Have you had at least one episode in the last 12 months? Q9B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA10
variable.description: Have you ever had shingles, also known as herpes zoster? Q10 [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA10A
variable.description: Have you ever had shingles, also known as herpes zoster? Have you had at least one episode of them in the last 12 months? Q10A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA11A
variable.description: Have you been treated with antibiotics during the last 10 years? Q11A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA12
variable.description: Have your gums bled while flossing or brushing your teeth within the last two weeks? Q12 [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA13A
variable.description: Has a dentist ever told you that you have gum disease? Q13A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA14A
variable.description: Have you ever been treated for gum disease? Q14A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA15
variable.description: Have you ever had gum surgery? Q15 [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA11B
variable.description: Have you ever had shingles, also known as herpes zoster? Approximately how many times? Q11B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA13B
variable.description: Has a dentist ever told you that you have gum disease? How long ago were you told about this? Q13B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA14B
variable.description: Have you ever been treated for gum disease? How long ago was this first treated? Q14B [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA8
variable.description: How many times have you had a cold or minor upper respiratory infection in the last 10 years? Q8 [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFA9A
variable.description: Have you ever had a fever blister or cold sore on your lips? How many time have you had this in the last 10 years? Q9A [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFAFLAG
variable.description: 1= Inflammation form [INFA] is present [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: INFACY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Inflammation Form (INF), exam 4]
